title: The Apple Pickers
medium: Two types of charcoal heightened with white on wove paper
credit_line: Gift of Dr. and Mrs. Daniel Fishkoff
provenance_text:
Eugène Louis Boudin [1824-1898], Paris and Deauville, France. Dr. and Mrs. Daniel Fishkoff, Colonia, NJ, by June 12, 1974 [1]; their gift to Museum of Art, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, December 1976.

Notes:
[1]. Daniel and Jane Fishkoff loaned the work to the Museum of Art, Carnegie Institute in June 1974; see curatorial file for original loan form and list of works.

creator.death_place: Paris (Ville de Paris department, Île-de-France, France)
